input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Campaign Analytics Dashboard Dear Customer Support,

I am contacting you to report that the campaign analytics dashboard has not been loading correctly My name is Sophia Rossi.. I think this could be because of a misconfiguration in the GitHub integration or a conflict with my Avast security software.

Having already restarted my system and run a malware scan with Malwarebytes, the problem still persists. I would really appreciate any help you can offer to resolve this.

Could you please let me know if there are any further steps I can take or if you need any additional details from me?

Thank you for your time and support.

Sincerely,
[Your Name] You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
